name: Dark Cave (Fontr)
description:
A demon lost in a dark cave, wanting to know everything about the world, is looking for its EDGE. The demon is threatened by many dangers, but he still goes forward, burning everything in his path.

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD for Movement

LMB for Attack

RMB for changing the position of the weapon

Game mechanics:

The player cannot endlessly shoot at enemies, because he has a limited supply of fire, so to reload the weapon, the player must stand on the fire blocks located ON THE EDGE. Thus, the player has to regularly stand on the edge of the map, risking damage from falling or enemies. When fighting with the BOSS, this is especially felt.
